fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Election!**: During Day 1, choose three party heads from the current game's player list. You can choose yourself. During Night 1, the chosen players will be notified that they must choose a color, as well as write a short speech (not exceeding 50 words). Your chosen color will determine the "policy" you're fighting for, with the effects being as follows:
**Red**: You will receive a +2 attack boost. All voters of yours will receive a +1 attack boost. Should you not have any abilities that utilize attack power, you also gain the ability to perform an attack with no additional abilities at night.
**Blue**: All players who end up not voting for this candidate lose a stage of defense. Should your role possess Vulnerable defense, you will die upon the election results being read.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
**Green**: The party head may choose x/2 players, with x being the players who voted for the head, to receive a "factional" chat with yourself, including a "factional" kill. The players chosen for this are not publicly revealed - these players may also win together, even if they wouldn't originally.
**Yellow**: The party head must initiate the passing of a shock. In real time, players will pass around this shock - with whoever holds it at the end of the following night being shocked with an Unstoppable force, which also strikes any visitors they may have - players who voted for the head of this party will be immune to the shock.
**Purple**: The party head and all voters of this party become part of a council. They hold an additional vote that following night to poison 3 non-purple players, which will kill the affected players the following night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Should any of your selected party heads die at the end of Night 1, you will prevent their death.
- Players who do not vote in the Day 2 election will be roleblocked the following night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the elected party head win the game.
